price: 74. Ciertamente, los pecadores que negaban la verdad permanecerán eternamente en el castigo del infierno.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
